main event: On April 6, 1969, a bright orange spherical object was observed hovering over downtown Dallas for approximately 20 minutes before rapidly accelerating and disappearing from view.
interesting points: The object was visually tracked and confirmed by air traffic control radar., Clear weather conditions prevailed during the observation., Local newspapers reported the incident., The object was described as bright and orange in color., Witnesses included civilians and a police officer who reported similar sightings.
witness description: Civilians and a police officer observing the object.
